name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Experience high-quality sound and comfort with our Wireless Bluetooth Headphones. With a long-lasting battery life and noise-cancellation technology, these headphones are perfect for music lovers and professionals alike.
features: Up to 20 hours of battery life

reviews.author: John Doe
reviews.comment: Great headphones! The sound quality is amazing and they're very comfortable to wear.

reviews.author: Jane Smith
reviews.comment: Good headphones, but the noise cancellation could be better.
